Worcester.Knut Erikson Three-Decker: The Knut Erikson Three-Decker is a historic triple decker apartment building at 19 Stanton Street in Worcester, Massachusetts. Built c. 1912, during the final phases of triple-decker construction in the Belmont Street area, the building exhibits some well-preserved Colonial Revival (although some, like its porches, have been lost—see photo), including a fully pedimented triangular gable, and stained glass windows in the stairwell.
